meanings.definition: Dry and flaky, often referring to skin.
meanings.sent1: Her elbows felt rough and ashy after forgetting to moisturize.
meanings.sent2: The ashy patches on his face were a result of the harsh weather.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her ashy hands were like tiny deserts.
meanings.sent4: The old paint on the house had become ashy and cracked.
meanings.sent5: The ashy skin on his heels made walking uncomfortable.
